review:
#APNE is Really very Beautiful and Family Entertainment Film. I Love and Heartily Respect Deol family. Beautiful evergreen film. Once in LiFE everyone have to Watch this FiLM. When i am in Studying in School 7th Std on that time this film was Released. I WANT TO BE A SON LIKE SUNNY DEOL SIR.
IN BOLLYWOOD FILM INDUSTRY NO 1 FAMILY IS DEOL FAMILY AS WELL AS VERY BEAUTIFUL STAR FAMILY.
ONCE IN LIFE EVERY ONE HAVE TO WATCH THIS FILM IN HIS LIFE. 
IN MY LIFE AFTER 12 YEARS OF THIS FILM RELEASED TODAY ...MORE

Apne 2007 ..It is not 6 point IMDb movie this movie should be 8.7 point ..You good well watch .. Family..Sadness moments ,Surviving in boxing Dharmendra as a father best role more than other actors Sunny Deol and Bobby Deol of Dharmendra 's son play very well thay fight for the father's honor..very good family movie i watch more the 8 times every moment exiting ,struggle , sadness....must watch it i salute Dharmendra and Sunny Deol..
Deols did superb work in this film. Love to see all deol in one movie. It's full of emotion. Dharamji is great.
